price: አላህንም በደለኞች ከሚሠሩት ግፍ ዘንጊ አድርገህ አታስብ፡፡ የሚያቆያቸው ዓይኖች በእርሱ እስከሚፈጡበት ቀን ድረስ ብቻ ነው፡፡
arabic: وَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَٰفِلًا عَمَّا يَعۡمَلُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَۚ إِنَّمَا يُؤَخِّرُهُمۡ لِيَوۡمٖ تَشۡخَصُ فِيهِ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā taḥsabanna al-laha ghāfilan ʿammā yaʿmalu al-ẓālimūna innamā yu-akhiruhum liyawmin tashkhaṣu fīhi al-abṣāru
